artist: Author: Nik Chatfield; Publisher: Weak Publications, Seattle
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical diagram of 3 plane axis with letterpress text printed in offset lithography on gray wove paper covers; 36 pp.
inscription: P. 1, green ink pen: Fly - always happy to see you / blow this town up - come back / again and rock us past sanity Nik Chatfield)
title: Maintaning Stability in Four Dimensions
